name: Base Design System Variants v1.2
description:
Preface

I'm loving this new variants feature that Figma has included in their recent update so I decided to publish a library of some base components that you can use in your projects.


Considerations

  • 6px baseline grid for all components


Updates - 12/31

Update includes:

  • Semantic naming conventions for variants.


Components and patterns in progress

  • Secondary Button updates.
  • Primary and secondary Tabs
  • Typography.
  • Side Pane pattern.
  • Fly-out navigation.
  • Headers/footers.


Feedback

If you have any feedback or feel that there are some parts missing from this component (or any components already included), please share your thoughts here, or reach out to me directly.


Last but not least

Please add to this library and share what you build!
